subject: Hacked 12-797 Experiment
author: foreverhaunted57
full_text:
Here is a link to an experiment that I conducted recently using an Optimus 12-797. The goal of the experiment was to use the radio to determine if whoever came through could see me and respond in real time. I was amazed with the results. Check it out. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-yyb2BYuRso

Steve
http://piedmontparanormalresearch.com/
